The NexÃƒÂ¸ is a systems validation test vehicle that CopSub is hoping to launch within the next couple weeks or so, whenever they get it all ready. The crowdfunding campaign for it just recently concluded and was fully funded, so there's no major barrier remaining besides the weather.

I'm a huge fan of Copenhagen Suborbitals, and I personally can't wait for the launch stream
